meanings.definition: A person who performs miracles or magic.
meanings.sent1: The talented thaumaturgist amazed the crowd with his magical tricks.
meanings.sent2: The famous magician was known as a skilled thaumaturgist.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled in delight as the thaumaturgist made a coin disappear and reappear.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to turn ordinary objects into extraordinary illusions made her a true thaumaturgist.
meanings.sent5: The thaumaturgist's presence filled the room with an aura of wonder and mystery.

meanings.sent1: The ancient thaumaturgist studied the art of magic and miracles diligently.
meanings.sent2: In the world of fantasy novels, the thaumaturgist is a revered figure.
meanings.sent3: The quirky thaumaturgist always had a trick up his sleeve to entertain his friends.
meanings.sent4: She was like a modern-day thaumaturgist, weaving spells with her words and actions.
meanings.sent5: The young apprentice watched in awe as the thaumaturgist summoned sparks of light from thin air.
